channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 32

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: You're welcome! I'm glad you enjoyed it! It was definitely tough to sacrifice those groups, but I think it's safe to say I was relieved that it ended up being the right move. =)
item.content:encoded: You’re welcome! I’m glad you enjoyed it! It was definitely tough to sacrifice those groups, but I think it’s safe to say I was relieved that it ended up being the right move. =)

item.title: By: scott
item.dc:creator: scott
item.description: I liked this game a lot. I definitely try to save everything, and i usually do, but in doing so i often give my opponents too much. Thanks for the review!
item.content:encoded: I liked this game a lot. I definitely try to save everything, and i usually do, but in doing so i often give my opponents too much. Thanks for the review!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I'm glad I wasn't the only one who thought of that! Haha. If I remember correctly, I was in a Go Segien-esque mood and really tried to play globally that game (minus some bad moves that were only locally beneficial. xD)
item.content:encoded: I’m glad I wasn’t the only one who thought of that! Haha. If I remember correctly, I was in a Go Segien-esque mood and really tried to play globally that game (minus some bad moves that were only locally beneficial. xD)

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.description: That's a great example of a game where white wins by giving everything up.
item.content:encoded: That’s a great example of a game where white wins by giving everything up.
